articles.title: Getting Started with HyberHost
articles.content:
# Getting Started with HyberHost

Welcome to HyberHost! This guide will help you get started with our services.

## Creating an Account

To get started, you'll need to create an account. Visit our [registration page](/register) and follow the instructions.

## Choosing a Service

We offer a variety of services, including VPS hosting, dedicated servers, and shared hosting. Visit our [services page](/services) to learn more about what we offer.

## Setting Up Your Server

Once you've chosen a service, you'll need to set up your server. Our control panel makes this easy. Just log in to your account and follow the instructions.

## Getting Help

If you need help, our support team is available 24/7. Visit our [support page](/support) to get in touch.
articles.excerpt: Learn how to get started with HyberHost's services, from creating an account to setting up your server.

articles.title: VPS Management Guide
articles.content:
# VPS Management Guide

This guide will help you manage your VPS effectively.

## Accessing Your VPS

You can access your VPS through SSH or through our control panel.

### SSH Access

To access your VPS through SSH, use the following command:

```bash
ssh username@your-vps-ip
```

### Control Panel Access

You can also access your VPS through our control panel. Just log in to your account and navigate to the VPS section.

## Managing Resources

You can manage your VPS resources through our control panel. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time.

## Backups

We recommend setting up regular backups for your VPS. You can do this through our control panel or through a third-party service.
articles.excerpt: Learn how to manage your VPS effectively, from accessing it to managing resources and setting up backups.

articles.title: Security Best Practices
articles.content:
# Security Best Practices

This guide covers security best practices for your HyberHost services.

## Strong Passwords

Always use strong, unique passwords for your accounts. We recommend using a password manager to generate and store your passwords.

## Two-Factor Authentication

Enable two-factor authentication (2FA) for your HyberHost account. This adds an extra layer of security.

## Regular Updates

Keep your server software up to date. Regular updates include security patches that protect against known vulnerabilities.

## Firewall Configuration

Configure your firewall to only allow necessary traffic. This helps protect your server from unauthorized access.

## Regular Security Audits

Perform regular security audits to identify and address potential vulnerabilities.
